name: Tiny Cosmo
description:
Help Tiny Cosmo find their friends: dodge dangerous black holes, trick menacing aliens and earn your rightful spot on the leaderboard.

Features you’ll love:
* Interactive controls: tilt your phone to steer
* Never-ending series of dangers: how long can you survive?
* Help your friends and earn a spot on the weekly, monthly or total leaderboard
* Personalise and customize your gaming experience by changing skins
* Learn cool fun facts about space
